data.name: Grim Fandango Remastered - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The Grim Fandango Remastered Official Soundtrack features remastered original music from composer Peter McConnell of Monkey Island 2, Grim Fandango, and Psychonauts fame. Recorded with the help of the Melbourne Symphony Orchestra, your ears are bound to be delighted.
data.about_the_game: The Grim Fandango Remastered Official Soundtrack features remastered original music from composer Peter McConnell of Monkey Island 2, Grim Fandango, and Psychonauts fame. Recorded with the help of the Melbourne Symphony Orchestra, your ears are bound to be delighted.
data.short_description: The Grim Fandango Remastered Official Soundtrack features remastered original music from composer Peter McConnell of Monkey Island 2, Grim Fandango, and Psychonauts fame. Recorded with the help of the Melbourne Symphony Orchestra, your ears are bound to be delighted.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
